key_risks: Regulatory uncertainty due to potential changes in healthcare policies or reimbursement models
Dependence on contracts with Medicare, Medicaid, and commercial payers
Competitive pressures from other value-based care platforms and traditional healthcare providers
Integration challenges from acquisitions and partnerships
social_issues: Ensuring HIPAA compliance and patient data security
governance_issues: Potential operational risks from integrating new providers and systems
